errors.EVENT_LOG_LIMIT: Too much participants to display all of them
errors.CANNOT_REMOVE_CUSTOMER: You are not allowed to remove the customer of {{resource}}, change the payment information first.
errors.UNSUBSCRIBED_OPTION: Sorry, it seems you did not subscribe to this option. Please update your subscription before coming back here.

schemas.ORGANISATIONS_PLAN_FIELD_HELPER: Select the billing plan of this organisation
schemas.ORGANISATIONS_EXTRA_INFOS_FIELD_HELPER: Enter any extra information to appear on your receipts
schemas.EVENT_TEMPLATES_NAME_FIELD_HELPER: Enter the name of this template
schemas.EVENT_TEMPLATES_ICON_FIELD_HELPER: Select an icon to represent this template
schemas.EVENT_TEMPLATES_DESCRIPTION_FIELD_HELPER: Enter a description of this template
schemas.EVENT_WORKFLOW_TITLE_FIELD_HELPER: Enter the title for this step
schemas.EVENT_WORKFLOW_END_FIELD_HELPER: Enter the interaction values ending the workflow
schemas.EVENTS_NAME_FIELD_HELPER: Enter the name of this event
schemas.EVENTS_DESCRIPTION_FIELD_HELPER: Enter a description of this event
schemas.EVENTS_LOCATION_FIELD_HELPER: Enter the location of this event
schemas.EVENTS_EXPIRE_AT_FIELD_HELPER: Enter the expiration date for this event
schemas.EVENTS_LOG_COMMENT_FIELD_HELPER: Enter your comment for this step

welcome.WELCOME_MESSAGE: This quick start guide covers the main application features.
welcome.ONLINE_HELP: Read first our online help to get an overview of the basic concepts.
welcome.CONTEXTUAL_HELP: To get contextual help whenever your are lost simply click on the following icon
welcome.TOUR_MESSAGE: Launch a quick overview tutorial detailing the main menu by clicking on the following icon
welcome.TOUR_LINK_MESSAGE: Each time a tutorial step exhibits this icon it allows to launch a new one detailing the target feature.
welcome.GOODBYE_MESSAGE: Thanks for reading this tutorial, you are now ready to use the application !

login.SOCIAL_LABEL: You can also login using external identifiers.
login.GOOGLE_LABEL: For instance using your Google account.
login.LOCAL_LABEL: You can login using your personal identifiers.
login.PASSWORD_VISIBILITY_LABEL: Display you password clearly if there is any doubt about.
login.LOST_PASSWORD_LABEL: If you have lost your password launch the recovery procedure.
login.REGISTER_LABEL: If you don't yet have an account launch the registration procedure.

reset-password.RESET_PROCEDURE_LABEL: If you have lost your password we will send you an email back containing a link to define a new one.
reset-password.EMAIL_LABEL: First, enter the email address you have used to register or to get invited.
reset-password.RESET_LABEL: Now finish by sending the email containing the link (please check the email is not in your spam folder).

register.LOCAL_LABEL: You can register to the system by defining your personal identifiers.
register.NAME_LABEL: Enter your name as viewed by others users first.
register.EMAIL_LABEL: Enter the email address you will use to connect and receive security related messages.
register.PASSWORD_LABEL: Choose a password, if it does not comply our security policy an alert will inform you about the rules to follow.
register.CONFIRM_PASSWORD_LABEL: Confirm your password to avoid any error.
register.TERMS_LABEL: Read and accept our terms of service in order to use the system.
register.EMAIL_VERIFICATION_LABEL: We will send you an email back containing a link to verify your address.
register.LOGIN_LABEL: You can now login whenever you want using your personal identifiers.

home.LEADING_LABEL: Open the side menu any time.
home.SIDENAV_LABEL: You can manage different aspects linked to your account.
home.ORGANISATION_LABEL: Enter the context of an organisation by clicking on its name.
home.ORGANISATION_LINK_LABEL: Enter the context of this organisation
home.ABOUT_LABEL: Display detailed system information and send us bug reports.
home.BUG_LABEL: Send us a bug report with a preformatted email containing required information.
home.SETTINGS_LABEL: Update general settings of the system on your device.
home.DASHBOARD_LABEL: Open the events dashboard of all your organisations.
home.NEW_ORGANISATION_LABEL: Create a new organisation to share your events.
home.ORGANISATION_DEFINITION_LABEL: An organisation is a shared workspace where you can invite people to join and collaborate.
home.ORGANISATION_NAME_LABEL: Enter the organisation name as viewed by others users.
home.CREATE_ORGANISATION_LABEL: Confirm the creation of your new organisation.
home.LOGOUT_LABEL: Logout in order to close your work session.
home.SESSION_LABEL: Otherwise the session will remain active on your device for 24H, you will not have to login again in this time frame.

dashboard.DASHBOARD_LABEL: Your dashboard details the current events in each of your organisations.
dashboard.GRID_LABEL: You can directly pick actions on your events from the list.
dashboard.ORGANISATION_LABEL: Enter the context of an organisation by clicking on its name.
dashboard.ORGANISATION_LINK_LABEL: Enter the context of this organisation

account.PROFILE_LABEL: This tab allows to update your profile information.
account.AVATAR_LABEL: Your avatar visible in the side menu when an image file has been selected.
account.NAME_LABEL: Your name as viewed by others users.
account.UPDATE_LABEL: Confirm the update in order to apply the modifications to your profile information.
account.SECURITY_LABEL: This tab allows to update your personal identifiers and your devices.
account.DEVICES_LABEL: This section list all the mobile devices you have used.
account.UNLINK_LABEL: Check for any suspect activity and unlink outdated mobile devices.
account.DANGER_ZONE_LABEL: This tab allows to remove your account.
account.DELETE_LABEL: A manual confirmation will be required before final removal.

change-password.PASSWORD_PROCEDURE_LABEL: If you want to modify your password you can define a new one.
change-password.NEW_PASSWORD_LABEL: Choose a new password, if it does not comply our security policy an alert will inform you about the rules to follow.
change-password.CONFIRM_NEW_PASSWORD_LABEL: Confirm your password to avoid any error.
change-password.CHANGE_LABEL: Enfin, terminez en confirmant la modification.
change-password.CHANGE_EMAIL_LABEL: A confirmation email will be sent to you (please check the email is not in your spam folder).

send-change-identity.CHANGE_IDENTITY_PROCEDURE_LABEL: If you want to modify the email address you use to connect you can select a new one.
send-change-identity.CHANGE_EMAIL_LABEL: An email containing a link to confirm the modification will be sent to your new address (please check the email is not in your spam folder).

events.EVENTS_LABEL: This tab allows to manage the events in your organisation.
events.EVENT_DEFINITION_LABEL: An event allows you to share information and photos as well as interacting with participants on the field.
events.OVERFLOW_MENU_LABEL: When not visible, you can find it using the popup menu.
events.TEMPLATES_LABEL: Before creating an event you need to create at least one model using this tab.
events.SELECT_TEMPLATE_LABEL: Whenever you want to create a new event simply pick the right template using the action button.
events.EVENT_CARD_LABEL: Each event is viewed as a card providing available actions.
events.UPDATE_EVENT_LABEL: Update properties of your event through this action.
events.FOLLOW_UP_EVENT_LABEL: As a coordinator follow this event up on a cartographic view through this action.
events.FOLLOW_UP_ACTION_LABEL: As a participant you can interact with your coordinator through this action.
events.ADD_PHOTO_LABEL: Take a picture and associate it to your event through this action.
events.ADD_MEDIA_LABEL: Join files to your event through this action.
events.EVENT_OVERFLOW_MENU_LABEL: Open the popup menu to see more actions.
events.REMOVE_EVENT_LABEL: Remove your event through this action.
events.REMOVE_CONFIRMATION_LABEL:
A confirmation will be required before final removal, this will send a

notification to all participants.

create-event.EVENT_NAME_LABEL: Choose a name for your event.
create-event.EVENT_DESCRIPTION_LABEL: Enter a detailed description for your event.
create-event.LOCATION_LABEL: Define the location of your event.
create-event.SHOW_MAP_LABEL: Visualise the location of your event on a map.
create-event.SEARCH_ADDRESS_LABEL: Enter the whole adress or part of it and select among the different results.
create-event.SELECT_PARTICIPANTS_LABEL: Select the participants of the event.
create-event.PARTICIPANTS_LABEL: Typing the first characters of a user name, a group name or a tag name make it selectable. Once added remove it using the cross.
create-event.SELECT_COORDINATORS_LABEL: Select the coordinators of the event.
create-event.COORDINATORS_LABEL: Typing the first characters of a user name, a group name or a tag name make it selectable. Once added remove it using the cross.
create-event.CREATE_EVENT_LABEL: Confirm the creation of your new event.

event-templates.TEMPLATES_LABEL: This tab allows to manage the event templates in your organisation.
event-templates.TEMPLATE_DEFINITION_LABEL: A template allows to define the recurrent content of a specific event type.
event-templates.NEW_TEMPLATE_LABEL: Create a new template using this button.
event-templates.TEMPLATE_CARD_LABEL: Each model is viewed as a card providing available actions.
event-templates.UPDATE_TEMPLATE_LABEL: Update properties of your model through this action.
event-templates.COPY_TEMPLATE_LABEL: Go fast by creatng a new model from this one through this action.
event-templates.TEMPLATE_OVERFLOW_MENU_LABEL: Open the popup menu to see more actions.
event-templates.REMOVE_TEMPLATE_LABEL: Remove your model through this action.
event-templates.REMOVE_CONFIRMATION_LABEL: A confirmation will be required before final removal.

create-event-template.TEMPLATE_NAME_LABEL: Choose a name for your model.
create-event-template.TEMPLATE_ICON_LABEL: Choose an icon to easily recognize your model.
create-event-template.SELECT_ICON_LABEL: Select the icon in our large library.
create-event-template.SELECT_COLOR_LABEL: Select its color in our palette.
create-event-template.TEMPLATE_DESCRIPTION_LABEL: Enter a detailed description for your model.
create-event-template.SELECT_PARTICIPANTS_LABEL: Select the default participants of the event.
create-event-template.PARTICIPANTS_LABEL: Typing the first characters of a user name, a group name or a tag name make it selectable. Once added remove it using the cross.
create-event-template.SELECT_COORDINATORS_LABEL: Select the default coordinators of the event.
create-event-template.COORDINATORS_LABEL: Typing the first characters of a user name, a group name or a tag name make it selectable. Once added remove it using the cross.
create-event-template.SELECT_LAYER_LABEL: Select the target geographical elements layer of the event.
create-event-template.LAYER_LABEL: Typing the first characters of the layer name make it selectable. Once added remove it using the cross.
create-event-template.CREATE_TEMPLATE_LABEL: Confirm the creation of your new template.

groups.GROUPS_LABEL: This tab allows to manage the groups in your organisation.
groups.GROUP_DEFINITION_LABEL: A group allows to delegate the management of a shared workspace limited to its members.
groups.NEW_GROUP_LABEL: Create a new group using this button.
groups.GROUP_CARD_LABEL: Each group is viewed as a card providing available actions.
groups.GROUP_MEMBERS_LABEL: This number shows you the members count of your group.
groups.GROUP_MANAGERS_LABEL: This number shows you the managers count of your group.
groups.GROUP_OWNERS_LABEL: This number shows you the owners count of your group.
groups.UPDATE_GROUP_LABEL: Update properties of your group through this action.
groups.GROUP_OVERFLOW_MENU_LABEL: Open the popup menu to see more actions.
groups.REMOVE_GROUP_LABEL: Remove your group through this action.
groups.REMOVE_CONFIRMATION_LABEL: A confirmation will be required before final removal.

create-group.GROUP_NAME_LABEL: Choose a name for your group.
create-group.TEMPLATE_ICON_LABEL: Choose an icon to easily recognize your group.
create-group.CREATE_GROUP_LABEL: Confirm the creation of your new group.

members.MEMBERS_LABEL: This tab allows to manage the members in your organisation.
members.MEMBER_DEFINITION_LABEL: A member is a user able to access the shared workspace offered by your organisation.
members.ADD_INVITE_MEMBER_LABEL: Add members to your organisation through this action.
members.ADD_MEMBER_LABEL: If your future member already has an account, add him using this button.
members.INVITE_MEMBER_LABEL: If your future member does not yet have an account, invite him using this button and we will create it .
members.MEMBER_CARD_LABEL: Each member is viewed as a card providing available actions.
members.TAG_MEMBER_LABEL: Update tags of your member through this action.
members.JOIN_GROUP_LABEL: Update groups of your member through this action.
members.CHANGE_ROLE_LABEL: Update the role of your member through this action.
members.MEMBER_OVERFLOW_MENU_LABEL: Open the popup menu to see more actions.
members.REMOVE_MEMBER_LABEL: Remove the member from your organisation through this action.
members.REMOVE_CONFIRMATION_LABEL: A confirmation will be required before final removal.

add-member.MEMBER_NAME_LABEL: Typing the first characters of a user name make it selectable.
add-member.MEMBER_ROLE_LABEL: Select the user role in your organisation.
add-member.ROLES_LABEL: A member has a read-only access to your organisation while a manager can edit it, and a owner has full control (removal, payment, etc.).
add-member.ADD_MEMBER_LABEL: Confirm joining the user to your organisation.

invite-member.MEMBER_NAME_LABEL: Typing the first characters of a user name make it selectable.
invite-member.MEMBER_EMAIL_LABEL: Entrez l'adresse mail de la personne.
invite-member.INVITATION_EMAIL_LABEL: An information email containing his temporary password to connect will be sent to your new member (please ask him to check the email is not in his spam folder).

add-member.GROUP_NAME_LABEL: Typing the first characters of a group name make it selectable.
add-member.MEMBER_ROLE_LABEL: Select the user role in the group.
add-member.ROLES_LABEL: A member has a read-only access to your group while a manager can edit it, and a owner has full control (removal).
add-member.ADD_MEMBER_LABEL: Confirm joining the user to the group.

tag-member.TAG_NAME_LABEL: Typing the first characters of a tag name to make it selectable if it already exists or add it otherwise.
tag-member.TAG_REMOVE_LABEL: Once added select it to update its icon/color and remove it using the cross.
tag-member.UPDATE_TAG_LABEL: Confirm modifying the tags on your members.

tags.TAGS_LABEL: This tab allows to manage the tags in your organisation.
tags.TAG_DEFINITION_LABEL: A tag allows to identify a subset of your organisation members (e.g. a skill or a service).
tags.TAG_CARD_LABEL: Each tag is viewed as a card providing available actions.
tags.CREATE_TAG_LINK_LABEL: How to create or remove tags on members
tags.TAG_COUNT_LABEL: This number shows you the number of members having your tag.
tags.REMOVE_TAG_LABEL: Whenever it is zero the tag is automatically removed.
tags.UPDATE_TAG_LABEL: Update properties of your tag through this action, this will update all members having this tag.

plans.bronze_DESCRIPTION: Our basic version for users just getting started
plans.bronze_DETAILS:
Unlimited tags
Unlimited events
Up to {{groups}} groups
Up to {{event-templates}} templates
Up to {{members}} members
plans.silver_DESCRIPTION: Powerful enough to run a small business
plans.silver_DETAILS:
Unlimited tags
Unlimited events
Unlimited templates
Up to {{groups}} groups
Up to {{members}} members
plans.gold_DESCRIPTION: Powerful enough to run a large business
plans.gold_DETAILS:
Unlimited tags
Unlimited events
Unlimited templates
Unlimited groups
Up to {{members}} members
plans.diamond_DESCRIPTION: Custom plan tailored for your business, with more control and support
plans.diamond_DETAILS: Unlimited events</br>Unlimited tags</br>Unlimited groups</br>Unlimited templates</br>Unlimited members</br>Host on your servers</br>Custom branding</br>
